article_title: Health Reform As Simple As Changing Incentives

article_metadata.author: Neil Versel

og.description: Dr. David Nash, founding dean of Thomas Jefferson University's School of Population Health in Philadelphia, can summarize the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act in four words. No, not "government takeover of medicine," as many critics have claimed. Nor does his description has nothing to do with insurance exchanges, employer mandates [...]
